website_summaries.verdict: Extremely safe quality of catnip that's perfect to add to toys, scratching posts, or food.
pros: Uses catnip that's only grown in the United States
Doesn't contain any extra chemicals or additives
Most cats will love to use this blend, sparking a high level of movement and exercise
Product seems very fresh upon arrival
cons: Some quality control issues, as stems and twigs appear in some packages

customer_reviews.title: Cat Wholeheartedly Recommends This Product.
customer_reviews.text: The packages of this canip are always with teeth marks and that ‘carried everywhere’ look. This is because my cat Will Find It in the house, no matter where it is hidden. Excellent catnip product. Always fresh and not full of plant stems. Better choice of product for cat gymnastic abilities. Cat agrees with this assessment. Note to self- write another note to self about latest hidden spot for Catnip. Do not let Cat find note to read. I also believe Cat becoming expert at unsealing the bag repeatedly....
customer_reviews.author: ~ Deck The Halls ~

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I put this in a coffee filter and put a rubber band around it. My cat watched me when she smelled it, and plays with it every day.
customer_reviews.author: mlb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, and Cat Approved!
customer_reviews.text: Usually I buy her catnip freshly dried, in bulk at an organic herb store. As they are closed for vacation I ordered online, with some concerns that Miso would turn up her nose at "non organic" catnip. No so! It was fresh and green, and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: feralinmendo

customer_reviews.title: My cat does not like catnip
customer_reviews.text: Figured i'd try this one and she doesn't like it. I believe the product is a good one and it does have a good smell but because she's not one to care for catnip, this is another that she's doesn't care for. I believe if your cat likes nip, it may like this one but if you're that customer who's cat seems to not like it, then your cat may not like this one either. Because I believe it's my cat and not the product, I didn't hold it against the product which is why I gave it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: I Heart Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this stuff, I mean they go crazy over it... they barely touch the store bought catnip, ive ordered this a few times now
customer_reviews.author: SF Industries

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Interest Cat
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to like this. It is packaged well in a resealable package and it is made in the USA and apparently safe. However, even though the cat usually likes catnip he had little interest in this even straight out of the bag. I tried putting it on some of his toys and he still didn't care.
customer_reviews.author: Spenser2Top Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: It's NOT organic
customer_reviews.text: False advertising. This product is not organic and doesn't state organic anywhere on the packaging. It is not certified organic as stated. Shame on you. I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it & it lasts and lasts
customer_reviews.text: The cats like this a lot, and not just when the bag is first opened. Also, there are very few little sticks in it.
customer_reviews.author: M.Khat

customer_reviews.title: Kitty didn't go for a bit of this 'nip
customer_reviews.text: My cat did not respond to this catnip at all. Normally, his radar would go off if there was a little 'nip in the neighborhood. I tried giving him more. I waited several days and tried again. Not interested. I assume it was very fresh as it was in an unopened resealable bag and then double-wrapped in plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Helenanne

customer_reviews.title: MY CAT GIVES IT 5 STARS
customer_reviews.text: My cat practically mugged me for it before I could open...then AFTER I gave him some, I put it away. Hours later I found it torn open under my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Zoë

customer_reviews.title: Best catnip for the money
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this stuff! He’s not too into catnip but he loves this one. I can’t give it too often because he’ll get bored but I’ll put a small amount on the floor once a week and he loves it. He’ll eat it and roll all over it. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and very fresh!
customer_reviews.text: Great catnip at a great price! The catnip is super fresh and it smells nice. My cat loves it so much that she even rubs her cheeks against the bag! I guess the smell is potent enough for it to have an effect on her even though it's in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: window.trees

customer_reviews.title: Happy cats
customer_reviews.text: My cats are loving this catnip. It is a good size for us as we don't give them catnip that often or large amounts. These cats rate it 5 stars and are rolling around in the catnip as I'm writing. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: jansvendsen60

customer_reviews.title: Cats Are Not Very Interested
customer_reviews.text: Usually my 2 cats go nuts for any catnip toy or loose, cheap catnip that comes included with scratching pads, etc., but they are not very enthusiastic about this catnip. Not too many stems... seems good quality to me....but not to them :-(.
customer_reviews.author: QualityBrands

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: My 10 week old kitten goes crazy for it. I don’t let him eat it yet.... but I sprinkle into his scratcher and he is definitely taken to it. I’ve read kittens are immune to catnip until around 5 months but my kitten RuPaul is crazy for it.
customer_reviews.author: LaLa Henderson

customer_reviews.title: This is great
customer_reviews.text: It was great the bag could had been Fuller. But my cats went nuts. My youngest cat ran off with the whole bag!!i I got it back but her got mad so it back and smacked at because he wanted it. He has never smacked at before ever!!!! He we Crazy ,Nuts , And BONKERS! LATER ON I had to hide that catnip so he hid my COFFEE!!!! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Hope Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I finally found catnip with more than .001 oz.! I was wondering if I ever would! The cat is so happy! Very very fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Van Ness Catnip
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this catnip. They lick it, roll in it and generally have a great time when they get it. Smells fresh. If cats smile, mine do when they get this cat nip!
customer_reviews.author: D. S.

customer_reviews.title: Cats like it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it based on the many glowing reviews and price per weight. Cats seem to like it as much as any catnip ive bought. Doesnt seem more fresh than any other though.
customer_reviews.author: RICARDO D DINTINO

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: The kitties love it. It smells very fresh. They come running as soon as I open the bag!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Carlson

customer_reviews.title: My cat was indifferent, but ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat was indifferent to this catnip, but I have already read in some articles that some cats just don't care about the smell, I don't know if this is my case, that's why i only give 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Faria

customer_reviews.title: Made in 🇺🇸
customer_reviews.text: Ah my cat seems to like it, and generally runs around crazy after it lol So cool 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Kubitz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't smell like catnip, my cat has passing interest.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves catnip. Not all cats like the same stuff. But this stuff smells more like tea than catnip, and while she will eat a little of it, she loses interest quickly. Definitely not buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Todd S. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in making cat toys for cats in shelters. I don't know how potent it is, but I have to say it's very dusty. The bulk of the bag seems to be fine ground powder and has made it a bit difficult to use for my purpose since so much of it shakes through the mesh sachet I use to place in the toys I make. It's okay, but not great.
customer_reviews.author: Terra Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great cat nip!
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 cats and i wanted to see how my cats would respond to cat nip and I was definitely not disappointed! My black cat Pickles absolutely loves this cat nip so i would for sure recommend this cat nip for any cat! Plus you do get alot of cat nip for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Nope for the cat
customer_reviews.text: But my dog is going crazy over it. I put it in a sock and every time I try to take it from her, she growls at me.
customer_reviews.author: LN

customer_reviews.title: Large quantity low price
customer_reviews.text: Large quantity for low price. My cat loves to eat it and sniff it !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than brands selling dried twigs
customer_reviews.text: Actual fresh (green) catcrack! Most others sell dried, brown steams with little leaves. And this even smells better. Only con is there is a bit of dust (pulverized catnip.
customer_reviews.author: JesSam

customer_reviews.title: Fine cut nip
customer_reviews.text: Good resealable bag. Fine cut nip. My cat is so finicky. Sometimes eats, sometimes not. Seems very fresh, though.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Miss Kitty approves
customer_reviews.text: Found the one thing my cat likes more than food 😂
customer_reviews.author: AunnaG

customer_reviews.title: They love it
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it. They want it every morning even before breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: Gregary  Fenwick

customer_reviews.title: Our two cats are wild for it!
customer_reviews.text: Bottom line! My cats love it. Managed to get small bag out of drawer and cat nip ALL OVER. they said YUM. REALLY.
customer_reviews.author: Ann W. Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Was not very well liked by the cats. Did not smell very fresh or potent.
customer_reviews.author: Magmore

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: My cat went insane!! He loved it! It has a very strong smell, definitely I’ll buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Selene Bartnikowski

customer_reviews.title: cat won't touch it
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats both don't even begin to take any notice of this cat nip.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa B.

customer_reviews.title: My cat didn’t like it.
customer_reviews.text: My cat could’ve cared less about this cat nip. It seemed stale to smell. I wouldn’t recommend you buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Master of OCD

customer_reviews.title: Cat’s Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Kitty loves this. I put it on his scratching pads.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie G.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it is to open the bag. The cat loved it. I grabbed the bag from my bf before giving it to the cat and the cat immediately jumped on his lap where the catnip was. 😂 I say money worth spent 🤞
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Aspell

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: Cats love it! Even got the neighbors cat coming over begging for it lol
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Your cat will be on cloud nine....
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff! My cat went nuts for this catnip! He was loving this catnip! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Gin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Catnip
customer_reviews.text: This catnip works phenomenal! My 12yr old cat loves it! She was literally "bear rugged" knock out asleep on top of it after rolling around for a few minutes in it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Well i thought because it was $3 i wasnt getting a good brand and it'd be a waste my cats both love it my mother woke me up tellin me that one of the cats knocked it down and was chowing down on more after he tore it open and i just ordered more so i better hide it.
customer_reviews.author: Halle

customer_reviews.title: Very Fresh!
customer_reviews.text: Very fresh and our cats love it! They can't get enough.
customer_reviews.author: Intheknow

customer_reviews.title: Kitty was not impressed
customer_reviews.text: My cat was not impressed, although in all honesty, very little does impress her 😒 I am sure the product is fine, it smells fresh, and is ktop quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: cat didn't even lift her head and she loves Walmart brand
customer_reviews.author: Banks

customer_reviews.title: Good catnip!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It's good catnip, and my cat loves it!
customer_reviews.author: MPO

customer_reviews.title: My cat went crazy foe this stuff. Ita a ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat went crazy foe this stuff. Ita a one ounce bag but its going to last me a month or so. That cat only needs a palm full and put it on the floor in front of the cat. They will go crazy for this stuff
customer_reviews.author: Destanee

customer_reviews.title: cats lost interest quickly even though they love catnip
customer_reviews.text: My two cats are big catnip fans. I bought this because it is organic. It smells potent. My cats play with it, but it doesn't seem to last like the bag of old catnip (different supplier/grower) that I'v had for a year. Yes, it works. But not long lasting. Cats lost interest quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kim A

customer_reviews.title: not my couch so I am happy!
customer_reviews.text: Put a little on my scratcher and he only uses the scratcher, not my couch so I am happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cats weren’t impressed
customer_reviews.text: Both my boys loooove catnip but their reaction to this bag is pretty muted. I don’t know if that means it isn’t fresh or just wasn’t very good nip to start with. Either way, a new bag of a different brand is now on my shopping list.
customer_reviews.author: drabbit4u

customer_reviews.title: Unsure.
customer_reviews.text: I dont know much about cats or catnip. I got this for the stray cats in my yard, but they didnt care for it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea fonseca

customer_reviews.title: Cats didn't like
customer_reviews.text: Neither of my cats were interested in this. It was packaged nicely and shipped quickly. Seller was easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi Carter

customer_reviews.title: Catnip
customer_reviews.text: My cats go crazy over this stuff. Dry product with a long shelf life. I have ordered this several times, ships fast.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald B.

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this catnip. Its kept very fresh in the zip lock bag.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: My cat is weird
customer_reviews.text: Apparently my cat just doesn’t like catnip?! Anyway I gave it away and I guess it worked
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Weak!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is all stems and twigs and hardly does a thing for my cat. Poor.
customer_reviews.author: LuckyD

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Didn't smell like catnip and had zero effect on my cat
customer_reviews.author: Ryan G.

customer_reviews.title: "Good Stuff"
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how this is different, but my cat loves this more than any other catnip we have tried. And I love the fact that it is organic. A win-win! Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Hallie

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Honestly my cat went crazy for this, she loves it!! I bought it like a month ago and I still have the catnip, its great quality I recommended !!
customer_reviews.author: Lilii

customer_reviews.title: cracked out cats
customer_reviews.text: The kitties all love this and run around the house like they discovered electricity in their tails. I especially like that it makes them lay on their backs and stare at us all upside down when they begin to calm down.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Cahill

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My cat was not at all interested in this catnip! I don’t know if it’s old or just not good to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Meh says the kitty ...
customer_reviews.text: Cat did not look twice at it ... although she does like other brands of catnip.
customer_reviews.author: cwasherri

customer_reviews.title: Cats gotta have the Catnip!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this Catnip and it's a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Melody S.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: My cat likes it and that’s all there is to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C.

customer_reviews.title: Good price.
customer_reviews.text: Well the cats like it, so it must be decent. The older cat is quite finicky, and this does it for him.
customer_reviews.author: collin

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST CATNIP.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased so many brands of catnip, and this is the best catnip. My cat loves this catnip. I will keep on purchasing this catnip. It is the best.
customer_reviews.author: LOVEAMAZON

customer_reviews.title: catnip
customer_reviews.text: it's organic and i like that! it's not the strongest catnip, based on my cat's reaction, but i know it's safe for her.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Webb

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: My cats LOVE this. Nice large pack for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product sent
customer_reviews.text: Update: Amazon sent me another one that was supposed to be organic, and it was the exact same wrong product. Not sure what the problem is. The picture says organic but the package I received says natural
customer_reviews.author: M.E.

customer_reviews.title: Not to the liking of my cats.
customer_reviews.text: My two cats totally ignore this product ... they sniff and walk away . I've sprinkled it on their scratching posts.
customer_reviews.author: Meetoo

customer_reviews.title: My kitties love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 fur babies went ballistic as soon as I opened the package. As long as they enjoy this cat nip, it's a winner for me. Great price for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: Kitty euphoria!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this stuff. Rolls around in it, eats it and shoves her face in the bag. Fyi, if your feline kid doesn't react to catnip, try valerian root! My cat loves both...can't open my vakerian root capsule bottle without her running over and rubbing her face all over the lid SMH 🤦🏾‍♀️🤷🏾‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lewis

customer_reviews.title: It is good catnip. Our cats love it
customer_reviews.text: It is good catnip. Our cats love it. The ziplock bag is a nice feature as long as you don't have a sneaky cat that will steal the bag and eat a hole in it, then spread it around the house. I advise storing it in a kitchen cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Kensler

product_meta.title: Van Ness Fresh-Nip Catnip, 1-Ounce
product_meta.description: Exposing your cat to all natural, organic fresh nip catnip will motivate her to exercise and will help to reduce her stress. Usda Certified organic catnip, grown in the USA. 1 oz.
feature_bullets: Exposing your cat to all natural organic fresh-nip catnip will motivate your cat to exercise and will help to reduce stress

specifications.Manufacturer: Van Ness Plastic Molding Co., INC.
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
